description.narrative: The project will rehabilitate a 77 km section of the regional road that links the tourist centers of Karshi and Kitab on the A380 and M39 highways, including pilot road side infrastructure development and install cross-border scanning equipment.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
More than 50 staff from the design institute and SCR will be trained in the new design and construction standards by 2021 (2015 baseline: 0)
